text: This is a list of women who served as the first lady of the United States. == List of first ladies == No. Portrait Name Tenure Age at tenure start President 1 Martha Washington April 30, 1789 – March 4, 1797 George Washington 2 Abigail Adams March 4, 1797 – March 4, 1801 John Adams 3 Martha Jefferson March 4, 1801 – March 4, 1809 Thomas Jefferson 4 Dolley Madison March 4, 1809 – March 4, 1817 James Madison 5 Elizabeth Monroe March 4, 1817 – March 4, 1825 James Monroe 6 Louisa Adams March 4, 1825 – March 4, 1829 John Quincy Adams 7 8 Emily Donelson March 4, 1829 – November 26, 1834 Andrew Jackson Sarah Jackson November 26, 1834 – March 4, 1837 Andrew Jackson 9 Vacant March 4, 1837 – November 27, 1838 Vacant Martin Van Buren Sarah Van Buren November 27, 1838 – March 4, 1841 Martin Van Buren 10 11 Anna Harrison March 4, 1841 – April 4, 1841 William Henry Harrison Jane Harrison March 4, 1841 – April 4, 1841 William Henry Harrison 12 13 14 Letitia Tyler April 4, 1841 – September 10, 1842 † John Tyler Priscilla Tyler September 10, 1842 – June 26, 1844 John Tyler Julia Tyler June 26, 1844 – March 4, 1845 John Tyler 15 Sarah Polk March 4, 1845 – March 4, 1849 James K. title: List of first ladies of the United States
